title: Been more than 48 hours, no response on ticket.
body:
So I sent in a ticket to support about my main (it's been forever and I don't have access to old email and forgot the pass to account) but I sent it without making a new account, when I go to check it says the page can't be found and I'm now wondering if Support even got my ticket.

If a Riot employee or something wants the ticket info to check I can give them the ticket number.

replies.body: Unfortunately, I don't see a summoner name or info from the account you're posting from.  If you have a ticket number, I'd be happy to check for you!
